name: Summer Rayne Oakes
specialization: Environmental scientist, eco-activist, and prolific houseplant expert. Author of 'How to Make a Plant Love You' and creator of sustainable indoor gardening content.

name: Darryl Cheng
specialization: Engineer-turned-plant expert. Runs the 'House Plant Journal' and promotes a scientific, data-driven approach to plant care, especially light measurement.

name: Hilton Carter
specialization: Plant and interior stylist, author, and propagator. Known for plant-filled interior design, propagation techniques, and several books on plant styling.

name: Anne Swithinbank
specialization: Veteran gardener and horticulturist trained at Kew Gardens. Expert in houseplants and garden-scale plants; author and broadcaster.
